basic.floral_language:
Epiphyllum oxypetalum 
Floriography: glorious, warm, distinct
Epiphyllum oxypetalum flowers beautifully in a very short time window in the night, called a beauty of moonlight.
Epiphyllum oxypetalum flowers are funnel-shaped, with linear calyx opening together with the flower, very bright and aromatic, after 2-4 hours the flowers close and wither, therefore it represents good luck for the difficulty of seeing its blossom.
Epiphyllum oxypetalum likes half shade, avoid direct sunlight in summer, in other seasons may increase the illumination time. Often blooms in June to October in the evening with a 2-4 hours time period.
basic.blooming: June-October blooms in early evening for 2-4 hours

maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade environments, in summer put in places with no direct sunlight, in other seasons may increase light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, rub the leaves with water to keep moisture in summer
